```{r}
#| echo: false

default_chunk_hook  <- knitr::knit_hooks$get("chunk")

latex_font_size <- c("Huge", "huge", "LARGE", "Large", 
                     "large", "normalsize", "small", 
                     "footnotesize", "scriptsize", "tiny")

knitr::knit_hooks$set(chunk = function(x, options) {
  x <- default_chunk_hook(x, options)
  if(options$size %in% latex_font_size) {
    paste0("\n \\", options$size, "\n\n", 
      x, 
      "\n\n \\normalsize"
    )
  } else {
    x
  }
})

```

#| echo: false
library("rvest")

load.recipes = function(dnr, dnr.num, bfst, bfst.num) {
  dnr.sample = sample(x=dnr,size=dnr.num,replace=TRUE)
  bfst.sample = sample(x=bfst,size=bfst.num,replace=TRUE)

  recipes = list()
 
  for (i in 1:length(dnr.sample)) {
    recipes = append(recipes,load.recipe(dnr.sample[i]))
  }

  for (i in 1:length(bfst.sample)) {
    recipes = append(recipes,load.recipe(bfst.sample[i]))
  }
}


load.recipe = function(fpath) {
  html = read_html(fpath)

  ingredients = load.text(html,"#ingredients")
  instructions = load.text(html,"#instructions")
  image = load.image(html)

  ingredients.html = as.character(paste("-", html_text(ingredients)),sep="\n")
  instructions.html = as.character(paste("1.", html_text(instructions)),sep="\n")
  image.html = as.character(paste('<img src="', image, '" style="width: 50%; height: auto;">'))

  recipe.html = list(ingredients=ingredients,instructions=instructions,image=image)  
}

load.text = function(html,id) {
  items = html_elements(html_element(html,id),"li")
}
load.image = function(html) {
  image = html_element(html,".img-fluid")
  src = html_attr(image,"src")
  link = paste("website/",src,sep="")
}


dnr.sample = sample(x=dinner,size=3,replace=TRUE)
bfst.sample = sample(x=breakfasts,size=1,replace=TRUE)
